text: I'm going to show you how to wear a
traditional Indian sari you want to
start by holding the end of the sari in
your right hand and you bring it round
your waist and the first thing you're
going to do is to make a little knot and
then find the other end of the sari and
we're going to gather it up simply like
this then we bring that round our waist
and you're going to tuck that over your
left shoulder and then we're going to
find the rest of the Saudi and we're
going to sort of bring it around the
front like this and what we're going to
do is make pleats you put your fingers
here and you're just gonna fold the
material back and forward and back and
forward you can see now all of my Saudis
essentially been used up you just take
these pleats make sure they're in front
find the bit around your waist and tuck
them in and then you just want to adjust
this so that you show off these lovely
borders on your sari and essentially
that is how you wear the Indian sari
